pouf1.description: Milo barfed on the pouf chair. To wash the cover, we had to emtpy it of its content! As you can imagine, putting it all back in afterward was no small feat.
pouf1.title: Pouf 1

pouf2.description: Milo and Felix decided that they like the pouf chair even better in its exploded form.
pouf2.title: Pouf 2

yogababies1.description:
The yogababies had a group birthday to celebrate their two years of fabulousness.

from left to right: Jaime, Lexie, Milo, Felix, Argil, Ariel, Jago, Kai with mom Jen, and Leo in front.
yogababies1.title: Yogababies 1

yogababies2.description: Ariel gives Jaime a kiss. Milo looks the other way, but he can't help remembering that, two years ago, HE was the object of Ariel's fervor.
yogababies2.title: Yogababies 2

yogababies3.description: It's been fun to watch our little ones grow up as a group, and each develop their own personality.
yogababies3.title: Yogababies 3

yogababies4.description: Saia, Eliot, Peter and Leo stoically wait for the signal that it's okay to dig in.
yogababies4.title: Yogababies 4

yogababies6.description:
Milo does a few stretching exercices before going back for thirds.

Jago and his parents moved to Portland about a year ago. It was good to see them for the group reunion! Milo and Jago share a birhtday and a love of chocolate.
yogababies6.title: Yogababies 6

description:
Short update this week: Dean took off on a business trip to San Diego, taking the camera with him.

Every Monday mornings, Lucie works at New School. For the most part, Milo is good about sharing her with the other kids, but here is a funny anecdote from this week. Little Cora came over and gave Lucie a big hug. Milo immediately rushes to their side and pushes Cora away, saying:
- No!
(he hugs Lucie defensively)
- This is MY mommy.
(he point to teacher Marcellina)
- This is YOUR mommy."

Does Milo think that all the kids in his class are the children of the teachers? We wonder.
title: September 24
